author: cnbc.com
title: MoneyOnMobile, Inc. Announces 42% Increase in Consecutive Quarterly Net Revenue
text:
DALLAS and MUMBAI, India, Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- MoneyOnMobile, Inc. (OTCQB: MOMT) announced the unaudited financial results of the company's Q3-FY2018 during a conference call and webcast on Wednesday, February 21st, 2018 which included the following highlights:
42% increase in consecutive quarterly net revenue growth (Q2-FY18 to Q3-FY18) 193% increase in quarterly year-over-year net revenue growth 210% increase in monthly net revenue growth from January 2017 to December 2017
To view a recording of the presentation and/or read the transcript visit: http://bit.ly/MOMTQ318Results
About MoneyOnMobile, Inc.
MoneyOnMobile, Inc. is an India focused mobile payments technology and processing company offering mobile payment services. MoneyOnMobile enables Indian consumers to use mobile phones to pay for goods and services or transfer funds from one cell phone to another. It can be used as simple SMS text functionality or through the MoneyOnMobile application or internet site. MoneyOnMobile has more than 350,000 retail locations throughout India.
